Effect: Launch a ball of nanites at the target location
Causes250-75damage to infantry in a radius of 3
Infantry killed by the Devourer creates nanoclouds that heals Foehn infantry in a radius of 2.2 at a rate of 8 hit points every 2.25 frames (0.15 in-game seconds)
Notes: A green flare will be displayed at designated zone right after support power deployment
